# Setup
To use the `spotifyr` package, you'll need to assign your API credentials ([accessible here](https://developer.spotify.com/)) to your R environment by following the instructions found [here](https://github.com/charlie86/spotifyr).

```{r Reading in r/HHH Essentials lists}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(spotifyr)

# Read in the overposted/favorites list
hhhe <- read_csv("r_hiphopheads_overposted.csv")

head(hhhe)
```
